description: This carrot cake overnight oats recipe is not only absolutely delicious, but it's vegan, gluten-free and made with healthy whole food ingredients! It's the perfect way to start your day.
keywords: breakfast with veggies, healthy breakfast recipe
name: Healthy Carrot Cake Overnight Oats Recipe
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup rolled oats (, gluten-free if needed (see note)
1/4 cup plain dairy free yogurt (, see note)
1 tablespoon chia seeds (, can omit if you donâ€™t like them)
1-2 tablespoons sweetener of choice (, I used maple syrup (optional for added sweetness)
1/2 - 3/4 cup dairy free milk of choice (, depending on how thick you like them (the creamier the milk the richer the flavor will be)

recipeInstructions.text: Add all ingredients into a bowl, jar or air tight container. Mix well, if using a jar you can put the lid on and shake it to combine.
Transfer to a jar or airtight container if using a mixing like bowl.
Allow to set in the fridge overnight or for at least 2 hours.
Top with toppings of choice and enjoy!
